items.q: How long until my project goes live?
items.a: We understand that speed is a competitive advantage. For a standard website or automation, our average delivery time is 4 weeks.

items.q: I'm not a tech expert, will I be able to manage the site?
items.a: Absolutely. Our goal is to empower you. We don't just hand over code; we provide an intuitive control panel and personalized training.

items.q: Are the costs fixed or will there be surprises?
items.a: We value transparency. Before we begin, you'll receive a detailed, fixed-price quote. That price is final.

items.q: Do you provide support after the project is delivered?
items.a: Always. We offer dedicated long-term support. After launch, we remain by your side.

items.q: My company is small—is automation really worth it?
items.a: Automation is for anyone looking to stop wasting time on repetitive tasks. SMEs often see the greatest impact.

items.q: Is Data Certification and Smart Contract tech complicated to use?
items.a: The complexity is under the hood—and we handle that. For you, it's seamless.
